appetizers.name: Baba Ghanoush
appetizers.description: Baba ganoush is just basically eggplant blended upwith lemon juice, tahini and sea salt. Typically you have to charthe eggplant on a grill or over the flame of a gas stove. Icurrently do not have access to a gas stove, and while I have agrill I recognize some people don’t.

appetizers.name: Jalapeno Poppers
appetizers.description: The flavor of the peppers come through, but the cheese and bacon put some of the fire out. I believe the 'tenderfoot' would even like these. I have even frozen these with good success.

coldSandwiches.name: Turkey & Avacado
coldSandwiches.description: A light and healthy sandwich on those days when you want something yummy, yet not really heavy. Perfect in the summertime with fresh garden-ripe tomatoes!

coldSandwiches.name: Buffalo Chicken Salad Slider
coldSandwiches.description: There is so much to love about these easy chicken salad sliders. The heat you crave is perfectly balanced by the creamy coleslaw topping so you get a whole lot of flavor packed into a snack sized treat.

hotSandwiches.name: Smoked Brisket Tortas
hotSandwiches.description: Yum yum foody food stuff mmmmm

hotSandwiches.name: Loaded Grilled Cheese
hotSandwiches.description: I can’t think of a word or phrase strong enough to tell you how good these sandwiches are.

desserts.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
desserts.description: Cookies not that great. You have been warned.

desserts.name: Layered Peppermint Bark
desserts.description: I never liked peppermint bark until I tried this recipe. The soft ganache center contrasts perfectly with the crunchy peppermints.

drinks.name: Mint Julep
drinks.description: Does not contain alcohol. Is delicious.

drinks.name: Chocolate Milk
drinks.description: For the kid in you. Or your kids. Or both.
